manufacturer: Isuzu Technical Center of America, Inc.

summary: ANTILOCK BRAKE SYSTEMS ACTIVATES ON DRY PAVEMENT DURING NORMAL BRAKING, UNABLE TO SAFELY STOP VEHICLE.  DEALER REPORTS ABS MODULE REPLACED IN JUNE 1998 BUT PROBLEM HAS CONTINUED.  ALSO, ABS WARNING SYSTEM LIGHT STAYS ON INTERMITENTLY.
